name: Space Trouble (Porush)
description:
Hi Guys, I made this game for my first game jam (Epic MegaJam 2021) within 5 days. I am new to unreal engine so I learned along with creating it, Hope you like it.

Note :- I am a beginner so there might be some bugs.

How To Play :-

It's a two player "last man standing wins" game where you win by surviving till last. There are 100 tiles for player to walk on, once you step on a tile it becomes red and if you step on any red tile then it collapses along with any other adjacent red tiles near it. But there is a very short time duration before red tiles start falling hence a player can quickly move to a non-red tile during that time. If a player steps in the area/hole where a red has already fallen then he falls and looses, making the other player winner.  A player can also make strategic moves to trap the other player, eventually making them fall along with the red tile they are standing on hence becoming the last man standing/winner.

Controls :-

  • Player 1 - W, A, S, D
  • Player 2 - UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT
  • ESC for Menu
